title: Jeff Glucker (Hooniverse)
description: Jeff Glucker of Hooniverse joins us and we talk about state troopers, ice racing, radar detectors, the new GT500, Mayan End of the World Rally and Lewis Hamilton's new Pagani.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: Jeff Glucker of Hooniverse joins us and we talk about state troopers, ice racing, radar detectors, the new GT500, Mayan End of the World Rally and Lewis Hamilton's new Pagani.
